:py:mod:`pyslam.capture.CaptureManager`
=======================================

.. py:module:: pyslam.capture.CaptureManager


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   pyslam.capture.CaptureManager.CaptureManager




.. py:class:: CaptureManager

   This class is responsible for getting captures
   from some set of registered sensors.

   .. py:method:: startCaptureLoop(captureRate: int)
      :async:

      Function to start the capture loop.
